channel.title: Adding Commands?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how i can add a command to client.java say like: ::busy and it will say "the owner is busy do not disturb" and this will show up on the screen in the bottom left?
And also how do change the time taken to save from 60 to like 20?

item.title: Adding Commands?
item.dc:creator: @mozzila mozzila
item.description:
@mozzila wrote:

Does anyone know how i can add a command to client.java say like:
::busy
and it will say “the owner is busy do not disturb” and this will show up on the screen in the bottom left?

And also how do change the time taken to save from 60 to like 20?
